titleStmt.title: A treasurie of catechisme, or Christian instruction. The first part, which is concerning the morall law or ten Commandements of Almightie God: with certaine questions and aunswers preparatory to the same
titleStmt.author: Allen, Robert, fl. 1596-1612.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Field for Thomas Man,

notesStmt.note: Part 2 was published as "The doctrine of the Gospel".
Reproduction of the original in the Library of Congress.
